reviews.review_content:
This theater grad student makes it well worth all the hassle it took to get placed into this class. He's an amazing writer who explains stuff clearly without using the Bedford as a bible. Just be warned that he wants to be a lit hum teacher, and so all of the papers are on the lit hum books.
Workload:
About 13 papers, inlcuding rewrites. Easy midterm and final. Everything is graded fairly, and he has no problem with giving you As and compliments if you deserve them. Overall, a good bet for a composition class.
